thread.title: One man dead, another man critically injured in Denver shooting
thread.title_full: One man dead, another man critically injured in Denver shooting - The Denver Post

author: Elizabeth Hernandez
title: One man dead, another man critically injured in Denver shooting
text:
Denver police are searching for a suspected shooter who left one man dead and another man in critical condition on Thursday night .
The two victims were shot in southeast Denver around 7:30 p.m. at the Spyglass Hill Apartments, 7100 E. Mississippi Ave.
Police said one man was pronounced dead at the hospital and the second remains in critical condition.
The shooting is being investigated as a homicide
Police did not release a suspect description or a motive in the shooting.
This story will be updated as more information becomes available.
Elizabeth Hernandez: 303-954-1223, ehernandez@denverpost.com or twitter.com/ehernandez
